Hero.best_prices: An apartment with the best prices.

About.p1: Perumnas IIDA Group was established in Indonesia in October 2017 as a subsidiary of IIDA SANGYO Co., Ltd. and PT Propernas Griya Utama (a subsidiary of PERUM PERUMNAS).
About.p2: IIDA SANGYO Co., Ltd. is a renowned property developer under the IIDA Group Holdings umbrella, which is a publicly traded company in Japan. IIDA Group provides more than 46,000 residences each year, and approximately 30% of the Japanese population chooses homes produced by IIDA Group.

Facilities.title: Balance In Your Life
Facilities.desc: Enjoy the balance of your life with the facilities available to residents of the Heartful Tower Bekasi apartment.
